properties.areaDesc: Upper Wind River Basin; Wind River Basin
properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 2 at 6:35PM MST by NWS Riverton WY
properties.description:
This is a special weather statement from the National Weather
Service Office in Riverton.

* WHAT...Blowing and drifting snow with northwest winds 25 to 35
mph with gusts of 45 to 50 mph.

* WHERE...The Wind River Basin, from Dubois to Riverton and
Hudson.

* WHEN...Until 1 AM Tuesday.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...If out driving on area highways during this
time frame, anticipate rapidly fluctuating visibility due to
blowing and drifting snow. The visibility will briefly drop to
near zero at times in some areas. Slick, icy roads could also be
in place, where the blowing snow crosses the road.

NWSheadline: Gusty winds and blowing snow across portions of the Wind River Basin this Evening
